Supportive: When user is the support unit, if the lead unit has a C Support or higher, the lead unit's Hit Rate +10, damage +2 and damage received -2

Healing Descant: Allies within a 2 tile radius recover 10% HP at the start of the user's Turn

Devoted Partner: If the Avatar is the lead unit, Avatar's damage +2, damage received -2

Evasive Partner: If the Avatar is the lead unit, Avatar's Avoid +15, damage received -3

Vow of Friendship: If the Avatar is an ally, when the Avatar is under half HP, user's damage +3 and damage received -3

Miraculous Save: When user is the support unit, the lead unit has a Luck% chance of surviving a fatal attack with 1 HP

Forager: When standing on Mountain, Woods, Waste or Field terrain, the user recovers 20% HP at the start of the Turn

Highwayman: When user triggers the battle, if the enemy cannot counter-attack, enemy's Strength and Speed -3 after the battle (stats recover by 1 each Turn)

Chivalry: When enemy's HP is at maximum, damage +2 and damage received -2 during the battle

Rose’s Thorn: Adjacent allies deal 3 extra damage and receive 1 less damage

Pragmatic: When enemy's HP is not full, damage +3 and damage received -1 during the battle

Lily’s Poise: Adjacent allies deal 1 extra damage and received 3 less damage

Fancy Footwork: Strength and Speed +1 to all allies within a 2 tile radius for one Turn when the “Rally” command is used

Bloodthirst: When user triggers the battle and defeats the enemy, Strength, Magic, Skill and Speed +4 for one turn

Fierce Rival: When user is the support unit, if the lead unit triggers a critical hit, the user is guaranteed a critical hit (if their attack connects)

Opportunist: When user triggers the battle, if the enemy cannot counter-attack, damage +4

Aching Blood: When equipped with a forged weapon whose name is at least 12 characters, Critical rate +10

Kidnap: When there is a Prison in My Castle, the user can select the “Capture” command. If a generic enemy is defeated, they will be sent to the Prison

Puissance: When user's Strength is 5 or more points higher than the enemy's Strength, damage +3 during battle

Misfortunate: Enemies within a 2 tile radius have their Critical Evade reduced by 15, while the user's Critical Evade is reduced by 5

Countercurse: When enemy triggers the battle and inflicts magical damage, the enemy receives half the same damage

Unmask: When engaging a female enemy, Damage +4 and Critical rate +20

Fierce Mien: Enemies within a 2 tile radius have their Avoid reduced by 10

Collector: Luck% chance of obtaining 3 Minerals or Foodstuffs after moving up to the 7th Turn

Forceful Partner: If the Avatar is the lead unit, Avatar's Hit rate +15, damage +3

Icy Blood: When user's HP is not full and they sustain damage, the enemy receives the same damage and the enemy's Skill and Speed is reduced by 3

Peacebringer: Allies and enemies within a 2 tile radius deal 2 less damage
